There are two yellow panels on the side of the exit. Hop on one and your partner will hop on the other. Force the platform your partner is standing on and they will Force you up to the ledge.






Use the Imperial panel on the ledge to open the door, then head inside.








Inside the room, you'll find some black buttons on the floor.








Quickly step on all of them to reveal this Power Brick in the center of the room.








Canister 3
After collecting the Red Power Brick, Sith Force the lights inside the room to reveal this Canister.








Part 2 - Catwalk Pursuit

Canister 4
Head all the way to the right on the bottom level to find this Canister behind a silver barrier. Use a thermal detonator to destroy the barrier, allowing you to collect this.






Canister 5
There is a grapple point on one of the platforms.









Use it to reach the upper ledge, then hop up and head to the right.








Head to the right and you'll find a yellow platform.









Hop on it and Force the gear a few times to raise the platform, allowing you to reach this Canister.








Part 3 - Palace Generators

Canister 6
As soon as you enter this area, head to the left. Use the Imperial panel, then quickly jump onto the small platform. After a few seconds, the platform will move over to this Canister.






Canister 7
Hop in the energy beam to the left of the Battle Droid Commander on the right side of the area to fly up to this Canister.







Part 5 - Duel of the Fates

Canister 8
This Canister can be found above the platform to the right of the entrance. High jump up to the platform, allowing you to reach this.







Canister 9
After Maul jumps onto the first platform, this Canister will appear above it. High jump onto the platform, allowing you to reach this.







Canister 10
After Maul jumps onto the second platform, this Canister will appear above it. High jump onto the platform, allowing you to reach this.







Minikit Model: Sith Infiltrator
Darth Maul - Modo Desafio
Required Abilities: Force, Grapple, High Jump, Imperial, Thermal Detonator

Part 1 - Theed Palace Hangar

Blue Canister 1
This Blue Canister can be found immediately to the left of your starting point.








Blue Canister 2
On the left side of the hangar is a broken N-1 Starfighter. Force the LEGO pieces onto it to repair it. It will then start hovering in the air.







There is a lever on each side of the starfighter.









Force them to open the hangar door, revealing this Blue Canister.








Blue Canister 3
There are two yellow platforms on the side of the exit. Hop on one and your partner will hop on the other. Force the platform your partner is standing on and they will do the same to you, lifting you onto the ledge above you.





On the ledge you'll find an Imperial panel. Use it to open the door, then head inside.








You'll find this Blue Canister in the center of the room.








Part 2 - Catwalk Pursuit

Blue Canister 4
Hop across the platforms on the bottom level and you'll eventually reach this Blue Canister hidden behind a silver barrier. Destroy the barrier, allowing you to collect this Blue Canister.






Blue Canister 5
There is a grapple point on one of the platforms.









Use it to reach a ledge, where you'll see this Blue Canister on the left.








Part 3 - Palace Generators

Blue Canister 6
This Blue Canister can be found behind the Battle Droid Commander on the left side of the room.








Blue Canister 7
Hop onto the platforms on the left side of the Battle Droid Commander on the left, then hop in the energy beam to get raised up to this Blue Canister.







Blue Canister 8
This Blue Canister can be found on a ledge to the left of the Battle Droid Commander on the right (it's hiding behind the energy beam in the screenshot). Ride the energy beam up to the ledge with this Blue Canister.





Part 4 - Force Fields

Blue Canister 9
This Blue Canister is on the right side of the area, right before the final force field.








Part 5 - Duel of the Fates

Blue Canister 10
This Blue Canister can be found on top the platform to the right of your starting point. High jump onto the platform, allowing you to reach this Blue Canister.
Personagem Bônus - Theed Palace
As the Republic struggles to deal with the Trade Federation threat, and the evil Sith plan to destroy the Jedi, daily life goes on across the galaxy.

In Theed Palace on Naboo, intrepid adventurers compete to collect one million LEGO Studs in the fastest time possible.

It's the desperate, ruthless life of a world in turmoil....

This Character Bonus can be tricky if you struggle to find Power Ups. Some of the plants and tan nodes will drop them, so take advantage of them when you find them. There are plenty of ledges and courtyards to explore, so do so to look for new sources of Power Ups. I recommend finding two sources of Power Ups, and then just going back and forth between them. The droids don't offer that many studs, except the Droidekas. Use a thermal detonator to destroy them quickly (just be careful not to get caught in the blast).

If you fail to complete this level within 5 minutes, you will not receive the Gold Brick. You will not get to keep the studs you collect in this level.
Minikit Bônus - Tatooine
As the Republic struggles to deal with the Trade Federation threat, and the evil Sith plan to destroy the Jedi, daily life goes on across the galaxy.

In the Pod racing arena on Tatooine, intrepid adventurers compete to collect one million LEGO Studs in the fastest time possible.

It's the desperate, ruthless life of a world in turmoil....

This Minikit Bonus is pretty simple. The area isn't that big, meaning lots of rocks and poles are clustered together. Stud collection is a breeze, with lots of objects being lined up nice and straight for you to destroy. Destroy the torpedo targets on the white structures to destroy them, revealing guaranteed Power Ups. Some of the rocks and poles will give Power Ups as well.

If you fail to complete this level within 5 minutes, you will not receive the Gold Brick. You will not get to keep the studs you collect in this level.
----Episódio II - Attack of the Clones----
Bounty Hunter Pursuit - Modo História
The Galactic Republic plunges ever deeper into crisis. Count Dooku leads a Separatist movement which threatens the future of the Republic.

On the glittering city-planet of Coruscant, Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker guard Senator Padme Amidala as mysterious assassins move against her....

Boss: Zam’s Airspeeder
Starting Vehicles: Anakin’s Speeder
True Jedi: 35,000

Part 1 – Coruscant Skies

This level is really quite simple. All you have to do to move forward is, quite literally, go forward. Pursue Zam through the twists and turns of the skies. Zam will be represented on your screen with a flashing green arrow, so simply follow it around. Follow Zam into the tunnel to reach the next area.

Part 2 – The First Trap

Come on Anakin! Well, you’re stuck between some power couplings, so you better destroy them. Fly through the two white lights to reveal a torpedo generator. Pick up some torpedoes and use them to destroy the six yellow generators by the power coupling. Doing so will shut it off, allowing you to continue your pursuit of Zam.

Part 3 – Anakin’s Shortcut

Similar to the first part of the level, you are once again free to pursue Zam. Continue to follow the flashing green arrow and make your way through the tunnel.

Part 4 – The Second Trap

How did this happen? We’re smarter than this! Time to free ourselves once again. Fly over the white lights (there are more of them this time) to reveal a torpedo generator. Take out the turrets, then use the torpedoes to destroy the twelve yellow generators. As soon as you destroy the final generator, you will automatically enter the next area.

Part 5 – Speeder Showdown

Finally, we’ve caught up to Zam. Time to end this! Simply shoot her a bunch of times to deplete her hearts and complete the level.

Unlocked Characters: Zam Wesell (27,500), Dexter Jettster (10,000)
Unlocked Vehicles: Anakin’s Speeder, Zam's Airspeeder (24,000)
Bounty Hunter Pursuit - Modo De Jogo Livre
Required Abilities: TIE

Part 1 - Coruscant Skies

Canister 1
There are 5 turrets for you to destroy. These will appear as you pursue Zam through the sky. They are all fairly easy to spot as they will shoot at you as you get close. The first turret is on the right side of the path, shortly after the TIE Gate.





The second turret is on the left side of the path, as you approach the large building that you can fly around.







The third turret is directly on the building that you can fly around.








The fourth turret is placed above your path as you approach the tunnel.








The fifth turret is to the left of the tunnel entrance.









Canister 2
On the left side of the path, you'll find a TIE Gate. Fly near it using a TIE Fighter to open it, revealing this Canister. Blast it or fly through it to collect it.







Canister 3
There are 10 green cylinder-shaped signs that you need to destroy. 6 of them are in this area. The first one is on the left side of the path as you approach the TIE Gate.






The second is also on the left side of the path, shortly after the TIE Gate.








The third is on the right side of the path as you approach the building that you can fly around.








The fourth can be found by the building you can fly around. When you reach it, take a left at the fork and you'll find this on the left side of the path.







The fifth is on the left side of the path as you approach the tunnel entrance.








The sixth is to the right of the tunnel entrance. The next 4 cylinders can be found in Part 3.








Canister 4
On top of the building that you can fly around, there are 5 blue objects. Grab torpedoes from the ships flying around and use them to destroy the 5 targets. Some of these are a bit tricky to target, so fly slowly and move your camera around to have an easier time targeting them. Destroying all 5 will net you this Canister.



Canister 5
As you approach the tunnel, you'll notice a traffic light hanging above you. Either shoot or torpedo each of the three lights (one facing each direction) and some airspeeders will move left to right across your path.





You'll notice that one of them is flying a billboard with an image of Jar Jar! Shoot the billboard to destroy it and you'll get this Canister.







Part 2 - The First Trap

Canister 6
You'll notice several gray panels on the ground with red pieces on them. Destroy them all and this Canister will appear.







This Canister will appear in front of the power coupling in the foreground. Either blast the Canister or fly through it to collect it.







Part 3 - Anakin's Shortcut

Canister 3 cont.
Having already destroyed the first 6 green cylinder-shaped signs in Part 1, you only have to destroy 4 more to collect this Canister. The seventh sign is on the left side of the path immediately as you enter the area.





The eighth green cylinder can be found by the location of the Red Power Brick. Take a right at the beginning of the area and you'll find this cylinder on the left side of the path.






The ninth cylinder can be found by the location of Canister 9, on the right side of the path before the tunnel.







The tenth and final cylinder can be found to the left of the tunnel entrance.
Bounty Hunter Pursuit - Modo De Jogo Livre cont.
Canister 7
Just like the first area, there are also 5 turrets to destroy in this area. Once again, as they are firing at you, they are rather easy to spot. The first can be found by the location of Canister 8. Take a right as soon as you enter the area, then fly to the end of the path to reach this turret.




The second turret is on the left side of the path as you approach the tunnel.








The third turret is right underneath the tunnel entrance.








The fourth and fifth turrets can both be found inside the tunnel, and are both visible in this screenshot. The fourth is on the right side of the tunnel, and the fifth is on the bottom of the tunnel.






Red Power Brick (Stud Magnet)
As soon as you enter the area, take a right and head down the path. You'll notice a series of dark green lights on the left side of the path. When you shoot one of these lights, it turns light green. You need to shoot all of these lights to turn them light green at the same time.




When you succeed, the game will show you most of the lights turning red.








You will then see a hot air balloon slowly rising from the bottom of the area. Wait for it to rise up, then shoot the basket to receive this Power Brick.







Canister 8
Further down the path past the location of the Red Power Brick is a TIE Gate. Fly up to it with a TIE Fighter to open it, revealing this Canister. Shoot it or fly through it to collect it.






Canister 9
As you approach the tunnel, you'll notice three triangular signs on the right side of the path. Initially, each sign has the image of a red dove on it. Shoot a sign twice and you'll change the display into a green Canister. Once all three signs are displaying a green Canister, the signs will explode and you'll receive this Canister.



Part 4 - The Second Trap

Canister 10
Just as in Part 2, there are more grey-and-red panels to destroy. Doing so will reveal this Canister.








This Canister is also hiding by the power coupling in the foreground. Shoot it or fly through it to collect it.







Minikit Model: Zam's Airspeeder
Bounty Hunter Pursuit - Modo Desafio
Required Abilities: TIE

Part 1 - Coruscant Skies

Blue Canister 1
This Blue Canister is almost directly in front of you when you start the level. It is slightly hidden behind that red-orange thing.







Blue Canister 2
This Blue Canister is inside the TIE Gate on the left side of the path. Fly up to it with a TIE Fighter to open it.







Blue Canister 3
This is on the right side of the building you can fly around.








Blue Canister 4
This Blue Canister is directly below the traffic light.









Part 2 - The First Trap

Blue Canister 5
This Blue Canister is in the bottom right corner.









Part 3 - Anakin's Shortcut

Blue Canister 6
This is straight in front of you as you enter this area, between the two signs with the green arrows.







Blue Canister 7
Take a right when you enter this area and you'll find a TIE Gate. This Blue Canister is inside. Fly up to it with a TIE Fighter to open it.







Blue Canister 8
This Blue Canister is to the left of the tunnel entrance between the two small rectangular signs.








Blue Canister 9
This Blue Canister is on the right side of the tunnel, next to the turret.








Part 4 - The Second Trap

Blue Canister 10
This Blue Canister is in the bottom left corner, hidden between the generators.
Discovery on Kamino - Story Mode
As Separatist activity continues to destabilize the galaxy, Obi-Wan Kenobi investigates the attempted assassination of Senator Padme Amidala.

With his astromech droid R4-P17, the Jedi Knight tracks the source of a poisoned dart to the remote world of Kamino....

Enemies: Security Drone
Boss: Jango Fett
Starting Characters: Obi-Wan Kenobi (Jedi Master), R4-P17
True Jedi: 50,000

Part 1 – Landing Pad

Looks like some lightning has destroyed one of the nodes. Head over to it and Force it back together. This will extend a bridge back to the right. Follow the Kaminoan to the right and head inside.

Part 2 – Circular Hallway

Head to the right, then follow Taun We through the doorway.

Part 3 – Creation Lab

Head down the hall and you’ll find a series of buttons on the floor in a square shape. Quickly step on all of the buttons and an object will rise out of the center panel. Force it to trigger a cutscene.

After the cutscene, the doors to the hallways will be lifted. Follow Taun We down the hall on the left, then use the Astromech panel to open the door. Head inside.

Part 4 – Apartment Hallway

Head down the hall and into the room on the right to meet Jango Fett.

Part 5 – Jango’s Apartment

At last, the bounty hunter we’ve been looking for! Jango will run out of the room, leaving some security drones behind. Defeat all of them to open the door back out into the hallway. Head out into the hall.

Part 4 – Apartment Hallway

Head down the hallway and you’ll see Jango protected by a shield. Two turrets on the ceiling will begin firing at you. Time your deflections to send the bolts back at them. Destroy both turrets and the shield will go down. Chase after Jango Fett.

Part 6 – Kamino Apartment

You’ll see Jango on the right. Head into the opening after him.

Part 7 – Catwalks

Jango has put some bombs on the path, so watch out for those. The trick is to get close enough to detonate them, then back away before you're damaged by the explosion. Each bomb will destroy part of the catwalk, so you’ll have to jump over the gaps. Pursue Jango to the right and he will turn and head towards the door in the back. He will hover across the gap and head up the elevator.

To follow him, step on the button to extend part of a bridge. Have R4 hover across the gap and step on the other button to complete the bridge, allowing Obi-Wan to cross. Force the LEGO pieces on the left to move them out of the way, revealing an Astromech panel. Use it to open the door, then head inside.

Part 8 – Landing Pad Approach

This guy doesn’t stop running does he? Head down the hall and you’ll be harassed by security drones. Use the Astromech panels to close the hatches, cutting off the waves of drones. This will allow you to operate in peace. Head down to the door and Force the LEGO pieces to the left of it to reveal an Astromech panel. Use it to open the door, then head onto the landing pad.

Part 9 – Slave I Landing Pad

Finally, time for a fight! The Slave I will take off and Jango will run to the center of the landing pad. Follow him and his hearts will appear. To damage Jango, simply deflect his blasts back at him.

After you take three hearts off him, he will jetpack up in the air. The Slave I will also start firing at you. You can run around to avoid the laserfire, but if it becomes too annoying, you can use any of the Astromech panels on the landing pad to start up a turret. The turret will distract the Slave I for a bit, allowing you to focus on Jango.

When you get him down to four hearts, he will start to launch rockets at you. Simply Force them back at him to damage him. When he’s down to one heart, the Slave I will stop firing and Jango will return to the ground and run around. Catch up to him and damage him to complete the level.

Unlocked Characters: Obi-Wan Kenobi (Jedi Master), R4-P17, Clone (13,000), Lama Su (9,000), Taun We (9,000)
Discovery on Kamino - Free Play Mode
Required Abilities: Bounty Hunter, Double Jump, Force, Grapple, High Jump, Hover, Imperial, Protocol, Sharp Shoot, Sith Force, Small

Part 1 - Landing Pad

Canister 1
Head to the left side of the landing pad with your Jedi Starfighter and you'll see some gears on the ground. Force them onto the platform to raise it up, allowing you to high jump to this Canister.






Canister 2
On the right side of the landing pad with your Jedi Starfighter, you'll see this Canister behind a shield. Hover across the gap and the shield will be shut off, allowing you to collect this Canister.






Part 3 - Creation Lab

Canister 3
After Forcing the console in the center of the room, the hallway on the right will open up. Head down it and use the Bounty Hunter panel to open the door, then head inside.






Inside you'll see a platform with a button on it. Hop onto the platform and stand on the button to raise up another platform. Your partner will hop on the platform and step on the button to reveal another platform, etc.





Hop across the platforms and you'll reach this large white ledge. Force the panels in the floor to reveal a platform which will raise up, allowing you to collect this Canister.






Canister 4
After collecting Canister 3, head back left across the platforms. You'll notice a bunch of containers in the back. To reach them, shoot the target to extend a bridge, allowing you to hop over.






You'll find this Canister inside one of the containers, as well as a bunch of travel chutes. Crawl through the travel chute on the far right to reach this Canister.






Canister 5
As you head down the hallway on the left, you'll notice some lights.








Force them to turn on lights in the back of the hallway.








Quickly Force all six lights to reveal this Canister. If you're too slow, you'll have to re-Force some of the lights, so be quick!







Part 4 - Apartment Hallway

Red Power Brick (Disarm troopers)
Use the Imperial panel in the hallway to open the door, then head inside.








Inside the room, you'll find a bunch of lights on the floor. Two of them are lit up. Step on one of the buttons and your partner will step on the other. The lights will then turn green, and two more lights will turn white.





Quickly step on all of the lights to turn them green, causing a disco party to break out. This Power Brick will then appear in the back of the room.







Part 5 - Jango's Apartment

Canister 6
You'll find this Canister inside a vending machine.









Force the handle on it four times to reveal LEGO pieces. Force them onto the mosaic on the wall, and the shield around this Canister will be lowered.







Part 6 - Kamino Apartment

Canister 7
You can find this Canister behind a shield. On the side of the shield are two symbols, each with a white circle. These symbols correspond to the buttons on the floor. Step on the button on the floor that matches the white light on the wall. Your partner will step on the other. The lights will then change. Do this two more times to lower the shield around this Canister.


Part 7 - Catwalks

Canister 8
As soon as you enter this area, look to the left and you'll find a gap.








Hover over it to reach the ledge with this Canister on it.








Canister 9
Head to the far right side of the first catwalk and you'll find a grapple point.








Use it to reach the upper ledge, where you'll find this Canister behind a force field. To lower the force field, use the Protocol panel to lower the platform. Hop on the platform and it will rise up. Shoot the three targets to lower the force field around this Canister. If you miss one, you'll have to use the Protocol panel again to reset the platform.



Part 8 - Landing Pad Approach

Canister 10
On the left side of the hallway is a black door. Use Sith Force to open it, then head inside.








You'll find this Canister behind a force field on the left side of the room. Sith Force one of the valves and your partner will Sith Force the other. This will lower the force field, but also unleash the security drones!





Minikit Model: Jedi Starfighter
Discovery on Kamino - Challenge Mode
Required Abilities: Astromech, Bounty Hunter, Double Jump, Force, Grapple, High Jump, Imperial, Sharp Shoot, Sith Force, Small

Part 1 - Landing Pad

Blue Canister 1
This Blue Canister can be found on a ledge by your Jedi Starfighter. Head towards the screen and look to the left to find it.







Part 2 - Circular Hallway

Blue Canister 2
Just to the right of the exit is a small broom closet. Use the Astromech panel to open it, allowing you to collect this Canister.







Part 3 - Creation Lab

Blue Canister 3
This Blue Canister can be found on the right side of the area.








Blue Canister 4
After Forcing the central console, the door on the right will be lifted. Head down the hallway and use the Bounty Hunter panel to open the door, then head inside.






You'll find a platform on the right with a button on it. Hop on it and step on the button to raise up another platform with a button on it. Your partner will hop on it and step on the button, revealing another platform, etc.





Hop across the platforms this way to reach the far right, where you'll find this Blue Canister. High jump up to it to collect it.







Blue Canister 5
After collecting Blue Canister 4, head back to the left and you'll see some containers along the back. Shoot the target to extend a bridge, allowing you to reach them.






Crawl through the travel chute on the far left to reach the alcove with this Blue Canister.








Part 4 - Apartment Hallway

Blue Canister 6
As soon as you enter this area, head towards the screen and you'll run into this Blue Canister.








Blue Canister 7
Use the Imperial panel on the left side of the hallway to open the door, then head inside.








On the right side of the room, you'll find this Blue Canister behind a shield. Use the Astromech panel to lower the shield, allowing you to collect this Blue Canister.






Part 7 - Catwalks

Blue Canister 8
Head to the far right side of the catwalk and you'll find a grapple point.








Use it to reach the upper ledge, then head all the way to the left to reach this Blue Canister.








Blue Canister 9
When you Force the LEGO pieces off of the Astromech panel, you'll create a platform. Use it as a boost to high jump up to the ledge with this Blue Canister.






Part 8 - Landing Pad Approach

Blue Canister 10
There is a black door on the left side of the hallway. Sith Force it to destroy it, then head inside.








You'll find this Blue Canister on the right side of the room.
Droid Factory - Story Mode
Obi-Wan Kenobi has tracked the bounty hunter Jango Fett to the planet of Geonosis. This rocky world, known for its droid production factories, forms the base of operations for the Separatist movement.

While Anakin Skywalker guards Senator Padme Amidala, Obi-Wan lands his Jedi Starfighter on the planet's surface....

Enemies: Geonosian, Droideka, Battle Droid (Geonosis), Battle Droid (Commander)
Starting Characters: Anakin Skywalker (Padawan), Padme (Geonosis)
Added Characters: R2-D2, C-3PO
True Jedi: 40,000

Part 1 – Factory Entrance

Head down the hallway and you’ll be ambushed by Geonosians. Defeat all of them to open the door at the end, allowing you to proceed into the factory.

Part 2 – Machines Making Machines

Drop down from the ledge you’re standing on and you’ll find yourself on the assembly line. Head to the right and you’ll find a press. You can either quickly run underneath it when it lifts up, or you can walk around it on the square panels. Be careful though, as they will collapse shortly after you land on them.

Continue to the right past the droideka and you’ll find another assembly line. Head to the right on it and you’ll find R2-D2. You can head back to the left and use the Astromech panel to shut down the assembly line if you want, but it’s not required. Continue to the right and Force the fan on the far right to lower it to the ground. Ride the air current up onto the ledge, then head through the door.

Part 3 – Buckets and Bolts

Head to the right and grapple onto the ledge, then shoot the target to reveal a bucket. Hop onto the bucket and onto the next ledge, then grapple up. Shoot the next target to move the bucket. When the bucket returns, hop in it and ride it to the right. It will then dump you onto a ledge.

Destroy the bombs to reveal a target, then Force it onto the wall. Shoot it to lower the bucket to the right. Hop on it and ride it up to the ledge, then hop on. Head to the right, then drop down onto the lower ledge.

Head to the right and you’ll see a moving bucket. Hop on it and ride it to the next ledge, then hop off onto it. Cross the gap (either by grappling, double jumping or hovering) and destroy the bombs to reveal an Astromech panel. Use it to open the door, then head inside.

Part 4 – Lava Pool

We’ve found 3PO, but we need to get him across the gap. Look to the right in the lava and you’ll see a platform. Force the gear to rotate it towards you, allowing 3PO to get on. Force the gear two more times to rotate the platform to the right.

Look to the right and you’ll see another platform in the lava. Force the gear to rotate the second platform, allowing 3PO to get on, then Force the gear two more times to rotate it to the right. This will allow 3PO to reach the opposite ledge. Use the Protocol panel to open the door, then head inside.

Part 5 – Factory Catacombs

Head to the right and you’ll be ambushed by Geonosians. Take them out and continue to the right, where you’ll find the path blocked by lava. Grapple up onto the nearby ledge, then shoot the tan pillar to reveal LEGO pieces below you. Drop down and Force them into a platform, then hover over to it as R2.

Hover across the gap, then use the Astromech panel to extend a bridge, allowing everyone else to join you. Continue to the right and dispose of the droidekas, then use the Protocol panel to open the door. Head inside.

Part 6 – Rescuing Obi-Wan

Use the Astromech panel on the right to reveal a bomb. Force it to the right, then destroy it to shut off the force field. Continue to the right and defeat the enemies guarding Obi-Wan, then Force each of the restraints to free him. Nothing can possibly go wrong!

Unlocked Characters: Anakin Skywalker (Padawan), Padme (Geonosis), Geonosian (20,000), Battle Droid (Geonosis) (8,500)

You will also unlock R2-D2 and C-3PO if you haven’t already
Droid Factory - Free Play Mode
Required Abilities: Astromech, Force, Grapple, High Jump, Imperial, Sharp Shoot, Small

Part 1 - Factory Entrance

Canister 1
Head straight back when you start the level and you'll run into this Canister.








Canister 2
This Canister can be found inside a small archway on the right side of the hallway.








Part 2 - Machines Making Machines

Canister 3
As soon as you enter this area, look to the left and you'll see a ledge. Quickly hop onto it (before the ledge you're standing on retracts) and crawl through the travel chute to reach this Canister.






Canister 4
There is a ledge in front of the center fan. Head to the right on it to find a hidden ledge. Force the gear into place, then Force it again to rotate the ledge to the right.






Use the grapple point to grapple onto the ledge, then shoot the target to reveal an Imperial panel. Use it to open the door, then head inside.







Inside, you'll find this Canister inside a container. In order to raise the container, you need to use the Astromech panels to make the color shown on the panel on the right. The first color is orange. Use the Astromech panels on the two colors that combine to make orange (red and yellow). Do the same for purple (red and blue) and green (blue and yellow). Make all three colors to raise the container around this Canister.

Part 3 - Buckets and Bolts

Canister 5
As soon as you get on the upper ledge, head to the far left to reach this Canister.








Canister 6
Use the Astromech panel on the upper ledge to open the door, then head inside.








Inside, you'll find a series of moving platforms.









Carefully hop/hover across them to the right to reach the ledge with this Canister on it.








Part 4 - Lava Pool

Canister 7
Use the grapple point above your starting point to reach the ledge with this Canister.








Part 5 - Factory Catacombs

Red Power Brick (Character studs)
In the center of the catacombs are three tan pillars. Destroy them to reveal an opening, then head inside.







Head to the right and you'll find an Astromech panel. Use it to shut off some of the shields in the room. Head to the left to find another Astromech panel. Use it to shut off more shields.






Keep using Astromech panels to shut off the shields and you'll lower the shield around this Red Brick.







Canister 8
After destroying the pillars to reveal the opening to the room with the Power Brick, you'll notice some LEGO pieces left behind.







Force the pile on the left to create a platform. Hop onto it, then high jump into the alcove with this Canister.







Canister 9
This Canister can be found tucked in an alcove to the right of the Protocol panel.








Part 6 - Rescuing Obi-Wan

Canister 10
Use the Astromech panel on the left to reveal LEGO pieces.








Force them into a platform and a press. Hop onto the platform and your partner will Force the press, raising the platform and allowing you to high jump up to this Canister.






Minikit Model: Droideka
Droid Factory - Challenge Mode
Required Abilities: Astromech, Double Jump, Force, Grapple, Hover, Imperial, Sharp Shoot

Part 1 - Factory Entrance

Blue Canister 1
This Blue Canister can be found inside a small archway on the left side of the hallway.








Part 2 - Machines Making Machines

Blue Canister 2
As you walk along the assembly line, you'll see an orange structure.








Hop the platforms (they will extend when you jump above them) to reach this Blue Canister.








Blue Canister 3
This Blue Canister can be found in that random metal tube after the assembly line.








Blue Canister 4
While standing in front of the center fan, head down the ledge you're standing on. Force the gear into place, then Force it again to rotate the ledge to the right.






Grapple onto the ledge, then shoot the target to reveal an Imperial panel. Use it to open the door, then head inside.







You'll see this Blue Canister on the right side of the room.








Part 3 - Buckets and Bolts

Blue Canister 5
Use the Astromech panel on the upper ledge to open the door, then head inside.








Inside, you'll find a series of moving platforms.









Carefully hop/hover to the right to reach the ledge with this Blue Canister.








Blue Canister 6
This Blue Canister is right between two droids on the right side of the upper ledge.








Part 4 - Lava Pool

Blue Canister 7
Use the grapple point above your starting point to reach the center ledge, then drop down to collect this Blue Canister.







Part 5 - Factory Catacombs

Blue Canister 8
In the center of the catacombs, there are three tan pillars. Before destroying them, head towards the screen and you'll find part of the rock jutting out into the lava.






Hover towards the screen to land on the ledge with this very well-hidden Blue Canister.








Blue Canister 9
In the center of the catacombs, there are three tan pillars. Destroy them to reveal an opening, then head inside.







Head to the right to find this Blue Canister by the Astromech panel.








Blue Canister 10
This Blue Canister can be found at the base of a small ramp on the left side of the lava pool.
Jedi Battle - Story Mode
In their attempt to rescue Obi-Wan Kenobi on the planet Geonosis, Anakin Skywalker and Padme Amidala have been captured by Jango Fett.

Obi-Wan has sent a distress signal to the Jedi Council. But hopes of rescue seem remote, as the evil Separatist leader Count Dooku oversees their execution....

Enemies: Geonosian, Battle Droid (Security), Droideka, Super Battle Droid, Battle Droid (Geonosis)
Boss: Jango Fett
Starting Characters: Mace Windu, R2-D2
Added Characters: Padme (Clawed), Anakin Skywalker (Padawan), Obi-Wan Kenobi (Jedi Master)
True Jedi: 8,000

Part 1 – Petranaki Arena

Your goal here is to free Padme, Anakin and Obi-Wan. Defeat the enemies marked on the screen, then Force them down to add them to your party. To free Padme, defeat the two droidekas and four security battle droids. Force her down to add her to your party.

Head to the right to find Anakin. To free him, defeat two droidekas and four super battle droids. Force him down to add him to your party. Continue to the right to find Obi-Wan. To free him, defeat four droidekas and two super battle droids. Force him down to free him.

Once Padme, Anakin and Obi-Wan are free, waves of enemies will appear for you to destroy. The first wave consists of six security battle droids. The second wave consists of three security battle droids and three super battle droids.

After the second wave is defeated, Jango Fett will jetpack down. To damage him, deflect his blasts at him and Force the rockets back at him. You can also just blast him with Padme. Take out Jango’s hearts to complete the level.

Unlocked Characters: Mace Windu, Padme (Clawed), Super Battle Droid (25,000), Jango Fett (70,000), Boba Fett (Boy) (5,500), Luminara (28,000), Ki-Adi Mundi (30,000), Kit Fisto (35,000), Shaak Ti (36,000), Aayla Secura (37,000), Plo Koon (39,000)
Jedi Battle - Free Play Mode
Required Abilities: Double Jump, Force, Grapple, High Jump, Imperial, Sith Force, Small, Thermal Detonator

Part 1 - Petranaki Arena

Canister 1
High jump onto the ledge on the left side of Padme's pillar.








You'll see this Canister on the ledge to the right. High jump onto it to reach it.








Canister 2
After collecting Canister 1, you'll see this Canister on another ledge above you. Carefully high jump onto it to collect it.







Canister 3
Force one of the levers by this gate and your partner will Force the other one, raising the gate and allowing you to collect this Canister.







Canister 4
Use the grapple point to the left of Anakin's pillar to reach the ledge, then use the next grapple point to reach the ledge with this Canister.







Canister 5
After collecting Canister 4, use the grapple point on the right to reach the ledge with this Canister.








Red Power Brick (Perfect deflect)
You'll find a silver object in the arena between Anakin and Obi-Wan's pillars.








Destroy it to reveal LEGO pieces, then build them into platforms to reveal this Power Brick.








Canister 6
Use the grapple point on the left side of Obi-Wan's pillar to reach the ledge.








Use the Imperial panel to raise up the platform, allowing you to hop onto the ledge with this Canister.







Canister 7
Force the LEGO pieces on the right side of Obi-Wan's pillar into a platform, which will then shoot up the wall.







After collecting Canister 6, head to the right and you'll find this platform moving up and down, allowing you to collect this Canister.







Canister 8
You'll find this Canister behind bars to the right of Obi-Wan's pillar. To reach it, Force the LEGO pieces into a ramp, allowing you to reach the travel chute. Crawl through the travel chute to reach this Canister.





Canister 9
To the right of Obi-Wan's pillar is an alcove. Force the pile of LEGO pieces into part of a pillar.








Force all of the parts of the pillar and this Canister will appear at the top.








To reach it, Sith Force the platforms in the back to lower them, then high jump up them and onto the top of the pillar.







Canister 10
This Canister is hiding behind a pillar to the left of Padme's pillar.








Minikit Model: Republic Gunship
Jedi Battle - Challenge Mode
Required Abilities: Double Jump, Force, Grapple, High Jump, Imperial

Part 1 - Petranaki Arena

Blue Canister 1
This Blue Canister can be found on top of Padme's pillar. To reach it, high jump onto the ledge on the left, then onto the ledge behind the pillar.







Blue Canister 2
This Blue Canister can be found behind a pillar to the right of Padme's pillar.








Blue Canister 3
This Blue Canister can be found by the ruins of a Dwarf Spider Droid.








Blue Canister 4
This Blue Canister can be found behind Anakin's pillar.








Blue Canister 5
This Blue Canister can be found behind a pillar to the right of Anakin's pillar.








Blue Canister 6
This Blue Canister can be found to the left of Obi-Wan's pillar.








Blue Canister 7
There are some LEGO pieces to the right of Obi-Wan's pillar. Force them into a platform, which will then rocket up the wall.







To reach it, use the grapple point on the left to reach the ledge.








Use the Imperial panel on the ledge to raise up a platform, allowing you to hop onto the ledge on the right.







Head to the right and you'll find this Blue Canister on a ledge. You can ride the platform you Forced earlier to reach it.







Blue Canister 8
This Blue Canister can be found to the right of Obi-Wan's pillar by some LEGO pieces you can Force into a small ramp.







Blue Canister 9
This Blue Canister can be found in an alcove to the right of Obi-Wan's pillar.








Blue Canister 10
This Blue Canister can be found in an alcove to the left of Padme's pillar.
Gunship Cavalry - Story Mode
The Grand Army of the Republic has been called into action. Led by Mace Windu and Yoda, the new Clone forces clash with the Separatist droid armies on the planet Geonosis.

Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker engage with the enemy, as they pursue Count Dooku in their Republic attack gunship....

Enemies: Hailfire Droid, Spider Droid
Starting Vehicles: Republic Gunship
True Jedi: 30,000

Part 1 – Geonosis Canyons

Your goal in this first area is to get through that force field at the end of the path. The force field is being powered by two generators. You need to take a bomb from the bomb dispenser on the left and drag it into the generators to destroy them. Watch out for the lasers that will occasionally power on, as they will damage you.

Once the first force field is down, continue along through the canyons. You’ll find the path blocked by another force field, so tow bombs into the generators to destroy them. Once the second force field is down, fly through the opening.

Part 2 – Federation Ship

Your goal in this area is to prevent the Federation ship from launching. There are four shielded sections that are flanked by generators. When the generators around a shield have been destroyed, the shield will be lowered and you can destroy the blue nodes. Tow bombs into the generators to destroy them, exposing the blue nodes. Destroy all of the blue nodes to complete the level.

Unlocked Vehicles: Republic Gunship
Gunship Cavalry - Free Play Mode
Required Abilities: TIE, Tow Cable

Part 1 - Geonosis Canyons

Canister 1
This Canister can be found on the left side of the path, near your starting area.








Canister 2
This Canister can be found in the center of the path before the first force field, in between two lasers.








Canister 3
On the left side of the path before the first force field is a TIE Gate. Fly up to it with a TIE Fighter to open it, then head into the alcove.







You'll find this Canister towards the center of the alcove.








Canister 4
This Canister is on the right side of the path after the first force field.








Red Power Brick (Exploding blaster bolts)
This Power Brick can be found hidden behind a rock on the right side of the path after the first force field.







Canister 5
On the left side of the path after the first force field, you'll find a gold barrier. Drag a bomb into it to destroy it, allowing you to collect this Canister.







Part 2 - Federation Ship

Canister 6
This Canister can be found on the side of the Federation ship.








Canister 7
This Canister can be found in the center of the path.








Canister 8
This Canister can also be found in the center of the path.








Canister 9
This Canister can be found on the side of the Federation ship.








Canister 10
This Canister can be found in the center of the path.








Minikit Model: AT-TE
Gunship Cavalry - Challenge Mode
Required Abilities: TIE, Tow Cable

Part 1 - Geonosis Canyons

Blue Canister 1
This Blue Canister can be found on the left side of the path before the first force field.








Blue Canister 2
This Blue Canister is on the right side of the path before the first force field.








Blue Canister 3
This Blue Canister can be found in the center of the path before the first force field.








Blue Canister 4
On the left side of the path before the first force field is a TIE Gate. Fly up to it with a TIE Fighter to open it, then head inside.







You'll find this Blue Canister on the left side of the alcove.








Blue Canister 5
This Blue Canister is on the left side of the path after the first force field.








Blue Canister 6
On the left side of the path after the first force field, you'll find a gold barrier. Drag a bomb into it to destroy it, revealing this Blue Canister.







Blue Canister 7
This is on the right side of the path after the first force field.








Part 2 - Federation Ship

Blue Canister 8
This Blue Canister can be found next to the bomb dispenser near the Federation ship.








Blue Canister 9
This Blue Canister can be found floating in the center of the path.








Blue Canister 10
This Blue Canister can be found on a small rock ledge.
Count Dooku - Story Mode
As the battle rages between the Clone forces of the Republic and the Separatist droid army, the Separatist leader Count Dooku flees to his secret hangar.

Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker follow closely behind, prepared for a final showdown with the Sith Lord....

Enemies: Battle Droid (Geonosis), Geonosian
Boss: Count Dooku
Starting Characters: Obi-Wan Kenobi (Jedi Master), Anakin Skywalker (Padawan)
Added Characters: Yoda
True Jedi: 10,000

Part 1 – Hangar Entrance

Head to the right and Dooku will run into the hangar. Follow him inside and through the door on the left. He will then flee through the door, closing it behind him.

To open it, head to the right and step on the button on the floor. This will extend a platform. Your partner will hop onto the platform (make sure you stay on the button on the ground) and step on the button, revealing another platform. Hop onto the platform and step on the button. Your partner will then hop onto the next platform and step on the button.

This will keep all of the platforms extended, allowing you to hop up to the left. Hop onto the upper ledge and Force one of the levers. Your partner will Force the other, opening the door below you. Drop down and head through the opening.

Part 2 – Duel with Dooku

Duel Dooku to take out three hearts. He will then Force you away from him and start Forcing containers at you. If you try to approach Dooku, you’ll get pushed away, so instead Force the containers back at him. Hit him with three containers to trigger a cutscene.

After the cutscene, Anakin will be taken out of the picture. However, Yoda has shown up to have some fun! Duel Dooku to take out three more hearts. He will then use Force lightning on you. When you are being shocked, switch to your partner and run up to Dooku for a free hit. If you are too slow getting to Dooku, your partner will take damage and you’ll have to wait a few seconds to try again. Hit Dooku three times this way, then duel him to take out his last four hearts, completing the level.

After completing this level, you will unlock Yoda if you haven’t already
Count Dooku - Free Play Mode
Required Abilities: Double Jump, Force, Grapple, High Jump, Hover, Sharp Shoot, Small, Thermal Detonator

Part 1 - Hangar Entrance

Canister 1
This Canister can be found floating off the left side of your starting point. You can hover to it, or you can just jump off to your death.







Canister 2
To the right of the hangar entrance, you'll find a grapple point. Use it to reach the ledge with this Canister.







Canister 3
Inside the hangar, you'll find two bombs next to the door Dooku runs through.








Force them both to the right to arm them.









Destroy the bombs to reveal this Canister behind some rubble.








Canister 4
On the left side of the final room, step on the button on the floor.








This will extend some platforms, allowing your partner to hop up onto the button above you. They will step on it, keeping the platforms extended and allowing you to hop up to this Canister.






Canister 5
After collecting Canister 4, high jump up onto the platform above you, allowing you to reach this Canister.







Canister 6
While hopping up the platforms on the right, you'll see this Canister. High jump to the ledge to reach it.








Part 2 - Duel with Dooku

Canister 7
High jump onto the solar sailor on the left side of the room and you'll find this Canister on a ledge. High jump up to it.







Canister 8
You'll find part of a pillar in the back of the hangar.









Force the pieces of the pillar to create a tower, then hop on top of it. You'll see this Canister on a ledge above you, which you can high jump to.







Canister 9
After collecting Canister 8, look to the right and you'll see this Canister hiding behind some cylinders. Destroy the cylinders, then hover over to this Canister.






Red Power Brick (Force pull)
On the right side of the hangar are some silver objects.








Destroy them to reveal LEGO pieces, then Force them into a travel chute.








Crawl through it, then head to the left, where you'll find a grapple point. Use it to land right on this Power Brick.







Canister 10
On the right side of the hangar, you'll find this Canister trapped inside a container. Shoot the two targets to open the container, allowing you to collect this Canister.






Minikit Model: Solar Sailor
Count Dooku - Challenge Mode
Required Abilities: Force, Grapple, High Jump, Small, Thermal Detonator

Part 1 - Hangar Entrance

Blue Canister 1
On the right side of the hangar entrance you'll find a grapple point.








Use it to reach the ledge with this Blue Canister on it.








Blue Canister 2
This Blue Canister can be found by the bombs.









Blue Canister 3
This Blue Canister can be found in the front left corner of the room with the extending platforms.








Blue Canister 4
Step on the button on the floor on the left side of the room to extend two platforms. Stay on the button and your partner will hop up the platforms and step on another button.






This will keep the platforms extended, allowing you to high jump up to the platform with this Canister.








Blue Canister 5
This Blue Canister can be found on the right side of the room with the extending platforms, on top of Dooku's speeder.







Part 2 - Duel with Dooku

Blue Canister 6
On the right side of the hangar, you'll find some silver objects.








Destroy them to reveal LEGO pieces, then Force them into a travel chute. Crawl through it to reach the ledge with this Blue Canister.







Blue Canister 7
This Blue Canister can be found in the back center of the area, near the containers Dooku Forces at you.







Blue Canister 8
This Blue Canister can also be found in the back center of the area, to the right of an object you can Force.







Blue Canister 9
This Blue Canister is behind the pillar on the left side of the hangar.








Blue Canister 10
High jump onto the solar sailor to reach this Blue Canister.
Character Bonus - Geonosis
As the Republic struggles to deal with the Trade Federation threat, and the evil Sith plan to destroy the Jedi, daily life goes on across the galaxy.

In the droid factory on Geonosis, intrepid adventurers compete to collect one million LEGO Studs in the fastest time possible.

It's the desperate, ruthless life of a world in turmoil....

This area is actually quite large, so take advantage of that by stepping on the buttons to extend bridges to new areas. Some of the silver objects and bombs will drop Power Ups, so use those to your advantage. Be careful and avoid shooting randomly, as you can destroy objects before you can get to them to collect the studs. Catch a ride on one of the buckets and you'll collect a whole bunch of purple studs (even better if you have a Power Up!).

If you fail to complete this level within 5 minutes, you will not receive the Gold Brick. You will not get to keep the studs you collect in this level.
Minikit Bonus - Coruscant
As the Republic struggles to deal with the Trade Federation threat, and the evil Sith plan to destroy the Jedi, daily life goes on across the galaxy.

On the city planet Coruscant, intrepid adventurers compete to collect one million LEGO Studs in the fastest time possible.

It's the desperate, ruthless life of a world in turmoil....

There are lots of nodes, signs and other objects for you to destroy. Hit the torpedo targets on the white structures to destroy them, revealing a Power Up. Some of the objects you can destroy will also reveal Power Ups. Lots of objects are clustered together, making stud collection a breeze. You shouldn't have too many problems with this Minikit Bonus.

If you fail to complete this level within 5 minutes, you will not receive the Gold Brick. You will not get to keep the studs you collect in this level.
----Episode III - Revenge of the Sith----
Battle Over Coruscant - Story Mode
The Republic is crumbling under a Separatist assault led by Count Dooku and General Grievous. In a stunning move, Separatist forces have swept into Coruscant and kidnapped Supreme Chancellor Palpatine.

As the Droid Army attempts to flee with their hostage, Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker lead a desperate mission to rescue the Chancellor....

Enemies: Vulture Droid, Droid Trifighter
Starting Vehicles: Jedi Starfighter (Yellow)
True Jedi: 75,000

Part 1 – The Battle of Coruscant

This level is pretty simple. You are on rails, meaning that you can only move around the screen, as the game will move you forward on its own. Fly around shooting down as many enemies as you can. Eventually, you’ll fly towards a Separatist ship blocking your path. There are five large red targets on the ship. Shoot them all to destroy the ship, allowing you to continue on.

Keep flying and shooting. Eventually, you’ll fly towards the bridge of a Separatist ship. Shoot the two red targets to destroy it, allowing you to proceed.

Continue flying and eventually you’ll fly towards a hangar on a Republic cruiser. Shoot the targets on the sides of it to open it, allowing you to fly through it. Continue flying until you reach the Invisible Hand. Shoot the targets on the sides of the force field to lower it, then fly inside to complete the level.

Unlocked Vehicles: Jedi Starfighter (Yellow), Jedi Starfighter (Red), Droid Trifighter (28,000), Vulture Droid (30,000), Clone Arcfighter (33,000)
Battle Over Coruscant - Free Play Mode
Part 1 - The Battle of Coruscant

Canister 1
This Canister is on the right side of the path as you fly straight down by the Republic cruisers.








Canister 2
This Canister can be found towards the center of the path on the right side of a Republic cruiser.








Canister 3
This Canister is towards the center of the path by the bridge of a Republic cruiser.








Canister 4
This Canister is towards the center of the path as you fly underneath a Republic cruiser.








Canister 5
This Canister is towards the center of the path.









Canister 6
This Canister is towards the center of the path as you fly over a Republic cruiser.








Canister 7
This Canister is towards the center of the path.









Canister 8
This Canister is on the left side of the hangar you fly through.








Red Power Brick (Vehicle smart bomb)
This Power Brick is on the left side of the path shortly after you destroy the bridge on the Separatist ship.







Canister 9
This Canister is towards the left side of the path.









Canister 10
This Canister is towards the center of the path as you approach the Invisible Hand.








Minikit Model: Drop Ship
Battle Over Coruscant - Challenge Mode
This Challenge Mode is slightly different from the others. If you don't collect all 10 Blue Canisters before the end of the level, you will not fail the Challenge. Instead, you will repeat the level until you collect all of the Blue Canisters or you run out of time.

Part 1 - The Battle of Coruscant

Blue Canister 1
As far as I can tell, this Blue Canister is right in front of you when you start. As soon as you start this level, you will receive this Blue Canister.







Blue Canister 2
This Blue Canister is in the center of the path, on the right side of a Republic cruiser.








Blue Canister 3
This Blue Canister is towards the center of the path, on the left side of the bridge of a Republic cruiser.







Blue Canister 4
This Blue Canister is towards the left side of the path, underneath a Republic cruiser.








Blue Canister 5
This Blue Canister is towards the center of the path.








Blue Canister 6
This Blue Canister is towards the center of the path, as you fly over a Republic cruiser.








Blue Canister 7
This Canister is towards the right side of the path.









Blue Canister 8
This Blue Canister is on the right side of the hangar you fly through.








Blue Canister 9
This Blue Canister is towards the center of the path.








Blue Canister 10
This Blue Canister is towards the center of the path as you approach the Invisible Hand.
Chancellor in Peril - Story Mode
High above the planet Coruscant, a deadly battle rages between the Separatist forces and the Army of the Republic.

On the Separatist flagship, Count Dooku and General Grievous hold Chancellor Palpatine captive. Crashing their Jedi Starfighters into the main hangar, Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker are surrounded by hostile droid forces....

Enemies: Battle Droid (Security), Battle Droid, Battle Droid (Commander), Droideka, Super Battle Droid, Grievous’ Bodyguard
Boss: Count Dooku
Starting Characters: Obi-Wan Kenobi (Episode III), Anakin Skywalker (Jedi)
Added Characters: R2-D2, Chancellor Palpatine
True Jedi: 60,000

Part 1 – Invisible Hand Hangar

You’ll see Grievous down the hall, so follow him. He’ll retreat and leave behind a squad of droids. Dispatch them, then Force the door to destroy it. Head through the opening.

Part 2 – Invisible Hand Corridor

Head down the path and drop down. Defeat the droids down here, then continue to the right. You’ll notice some LEGO pieces on the wall. Force them to create platforms, then hop up them to reach the upper ledge. Force either of the yellow grates to reveal an opening, then head inside.

Part 3 – Vent Access

Head down the path and defeat all of the droids. Once all the droids are scrap, R2 will appear out of an elevator. Use the Astromech panel on the right to open the elevator, revealing a bomb. Force it to the right, then Force it again to destroy it. This will knock down a panel, allowing you to head up and through the opening.

Part 4 – Ventilation Room

Head to the right and Force the LEGO pieces on the wall to create a platform. Hop on it and onto the ledge above you, then Force the lever to start an air current flowing. Ride it to the upper ledge, then use the Astromech panel to open the door. Head inside.

Part 5 – Do it!

We’ve found the Chancellor, but Dooku is here! Duel him to take out a heart. He will then hit you with Force lightning. Switch to your partner and get a free hit on Dooku. If you are too slow, your partner will be damaged and you’ll have to wait for him to use Force lightning again.

He will then jump up to the ledge, so head up the stairs after him. Duel him to take out a heart, then switch to your partner when he uses Force lightning. He will then jump back down. Follow him, then repeat the process to take out his last two hearts.

After the cutscene, Chancellor Palpatine will be added to the party. Head up the stairs and through the open door. You’ll be in a room with a bunch of elevators. Head through the door directly in front of you.

Part 6 – Elevator Shaft

Yes, that is an elevator chasing you. Run down the path. Be careful to avoid the air vents, as they’ll slam you into the ceiling. If you die before you reach the end of the path, you'll have to start this section over. Once you reach the end, you can use the Astromech panel to retract the elevator so you can explore. When you’re ready, head through the opening.

Part 7 – Sideways Corridor

Head down the path. Eventually, your path will be blocked by some gas. Force the yellow valve to shut off the gas, then continue to the right. You’ll find more gas blocking your path. Head through as R2 (if any other characters touch the gas, they will die), then use the Astromech panel to shut off the gas. Destroy the panel in the wall to create a ramp, allowing R2 to continue to the right. Continue to the right and use the Astromech panel to open the door. Head inside.

Part 8 – Invisible Hand Bridge

Head down the path and into the bridge. Force one of the blue levers and your partner will Force the other one, completing the level.

Unlocked Characters: Obi-Wan Kenobi (Episode III), Anakin Skywalker (Jedi), Chancellor Palpatine, Count Dooku (100,000), Grievous’ Bodyguard (42,000)

You will also unlock R2-D2 if you haven’t already
Chancellor in Peril - Free Play Mode
Required Abilities: Astromech, Force, Grapple, Protocol, Small, Thermal Detonator

Part 1 - Invisible Hand Hangar

Canister 1
There is a grapple point on the right side of the hangar.








Use it to reach the upper ledge, then head to the left to find this Canister.








Part 2 - Invisible Hand Corridor

Canister 2
Before you drop down to the lower level, you'll see a grapple point on the right. Use it to reach the ledge with this Canister.







Part 3 - Vent Access

Canister 3
Use the Astromech panel on the far left elevator to open it, revealing this Canister inside.








Canister 4
Use the Protocol panel in front of the second elevator from the right to open it, revealing this Canister inside.







Part 4 - Ventilation Room

Canister 5
This Canister can be found on the far left side of the area.








Canister 6
You'll find a travel chute on the right side of the area, just underneath the LEGO pieces you Force.








Crawl through it to reach the ledge with this Canister. You can also high jump up to this ledge from your starting point if you prefer.







Part 5 - Do it!

Canister 7
In the room with the elevators, head into the top right elevator, where you'll find this Canister.








Part 6 - Elevator Shaft

Red Power Brick (Super astromech)
After successfully evading the elevator, use the Astromech panel to send the elevator back up the shaft.







Head back down the shaft and you'll find that one of the vents has some silver objects in it. Destroy them to reveal this Power Brick.







Part 7 - Sideways Corridor

Canister 8
You'll see an orange container on the path.









Force the yellow valve underneath it to destroy it, revealing this Canister.








Part 8 - Invisible Hand Bridge

Canister 9
This Canister can be found on the left side of the bridge.








Canister 10
This Canister can be found on the right side of the bridge.








Minikit Model: Emergency Ship
Chancellor in Peril - Challenge Mode
Required Abilities: Astromech, Double Jump, Grapple, Protocol

Part 1 - Invisible Hand Hangar

Blue Canister 1
This Blue Canister can be found on the right side of Anakin's starfighter.








Blue Canister 2
There is a grapple point in the back right corner of the hangar.








Use it to reach the upper ledge, then head to the left to find this Blue Canister.








Part 2 - Invisible Hand Corridor

Blue Canister 3
There is an Astromech panel on the ground level. Use it to power a lift.








Ride the lift to the upper ledge, where you'll find this machine at the end of the hall. This Blue Canister is hiding right behind it.







Part 3 - Vent Access

Blue Canister 4
Use the Protocol panel to open the elevator with this Blue Canister inside.








Part 4 - Ventilation Room

Blue Canister 5
This Blue Canister can be found on the far left side of the area.








Blue Canister 6
This Blue Canister can be found on the far right side of the area.








Part 5 - Do it!

Blue Canister 7
This Blue Canister can be found on top of a pillar in the front left corner of the area.








Blue Canister 8
Head up the stairs and into the door on the right to find this Blue Canister.








Part 7 - Sideways Corridor

Blue Canister 9
This Blue Canister is just hanging out in the center of the path.








Part 8 - Invisible Hand Bridge

Blue Canister 10
This Blue Canister is partially hidden behind a console on the left side of the bridge.
General Grievous - Story Mode
Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker have saved Chancellor Palpatine. But his captor, General Grievous, has escaped.

The Jedi Council assigns Obi-Wan Kenobi the task of hunting down Grievous, who is hiding on the sinkhole world of Utapau....

Boss: General Grievous
Starting Characters: Obi-Wan Kenobi (Episode III), Commander Cody
True Jedi: 3,500

Part 1 – Landing Pad

This level is just one big boss fight against General Grievous. Duel Grievous to take out one heart. He will then jump to the left. Have Cody shoot the two bombs near him to damage him, causing him to jump back to the landing pad. Duel him to take out two more hearts.

He will then jump onto another ledge. To reach him, Force the LEGO pieces on the left side of the landing pad into a bridge. Cross it, then double jump or grapple onto the ledge on the right. Continue to the right, then Force the LEGO pieces into a platform. Hop onto it as Cody and shoot the bomb on the ledge next to Grievous (you may have to jump and shoot a few times before you hit the bomb). This will damage Grievous, who will then jump back to the landing pad.

Return to the landing pad and duel Grievous to take out two more hearts. He will then jump onto another ledge. Return to the ledge you were on before, then Force the LEGO pieces into platforms. Hop up them and onto the ledge, then destroy the panel on the left to reveal a bomb. Force it out of the alcove and across the gap, then shoot it to damage Grievous. He will then retreat to the landing pad. Return to the landing pad and duel Grievous to take out his last two hearts, ending the level.

Unlocked Characters: Commander Cody, General Grievous (70,000)
General Grievous - Free Play Mode
Required Abilities: Double Jump, Force, High Jump, Hover, Thermal Detonator

Part 1 - Landing Pad

Canister 1
This Canister can be found on a ledge opposite the landing pad.








Canister 2
Head to the left side of the landing pad and you'll see a ledge off to the left.








Hover over to it and you'll find a silver wall.









Destroy it to reveal this Canister on a ledge.









Canister 3
After crossing the bridge, hop up onto the ledge on the left, where you'll find some LEGO pieces.








Force them into platforms, allowing you to hop up to this Canister.








Canister 4
While standing under the second ledge Grievous leaps to, you'll notice a wall panel on the right. Shoot it to reveal this Canister. Hover into the alcove with it to collect it.






Canister 5
This Canister can be found high in the air next to the wall panel you destroy to reveal a bomb. High jump to collect it.







Canister 6
This Canister appears in the alcove after Forcing the bomb out of it.








Canister 7
While standing on the ledge where you destroy the wall panel to reveal a bomb, drop down and head to the far right. You'll find this Canister below you.







Canister 8
This Canister can be found on the final ledge that Grievous leaps to. You can either hover across to it from where you Force the bomb, or you can high jump up here from the ledge below.






Canister 9
After collecting Canister 8, continue to the right on the ledge to run into this Canister.








Canister 10
After collecting Canister 9, continue to the right across the bridge. You'll find the entrance to a building, so head inside.







Inside, you'll find a bunch of mines on the floor. You'll need to detonate all of them to reveal this Canister. You can either shoot them (which I recommend if you don't have Invincibility) or walk up to them to trigger them.





Once all of the mines are destroyed, this Canister will appear.








Red Power Brick (Super Jedi slam)
After collecting Canister 10, look towards the center of the room and you'll find four levers.








Force all of them to raise up the cylinder in the middle of the room, revealing this Power Brick.








Minikit Model: Jedi Starfighter (Episode III)
General Grievous - Challenge Mode
Required Abilities: Double Jump, Force, High Jump, Hover, Thermal Detonator

Part 1 - Landing Pad

Blue Canister 1
This Blue Canister is on the right side of the landing pad.








Blue Canister 2
This Blue Canister is on a ledge across from the landing pad.








Blue Canister 3
Head to the left side of the landing pad and you'll see a ledge.








Hover over to it, then continue to the left to find a silver wall.








Destroy it to reveal this Blue Canister.









Blue Canister 4
This Blue Canister can be found shortly after crossing the bridge.








Blue Canister 5
This Blue Canister is on the left side of the ledge Grievous hops to (where you have to jump and shoot the bomb).







Blue Canister 6
While on the ledge you reach after hopping up the platforms, drop down to the right to find this Blue Canister.







Blue Canister 7
High jump onto the ledge on the far right (the final ledge Grievous leaps to) and head to the right to find this Blue Canister.







Blue Canister 8
After collecting Blue Canister 7, continue to the right to find this Blue Canister on a bridge.








Blue Canister 9
After collecting Blue Canister 8, continue to the right and you'll find the entrance to a building.








Head inside and you'll find this Blue Canister on the left (you'll have to walk around inside to reach it).








Blue Canister 10
After collecting Blue Canister 9, look towards the center of the area and you'll find some levers.








Force all four of them to lift up the column in the center of the area, revealing this Blue Canister.
Defense of Kashyyyk - Story Mode
Obi-Wan Kenobi has taken care of General Grievous, but the Clone Wars continue. Across the galaxy, Jedi Knights lead the Army of the Republic into battle against Separatist forces.

Jedi Master Yoda fights on the Wookiee planet of Kashyyyk. But the Sith Lord Darth Sidious is about to reveal himself, and draw a new darkness over the galaxy....

Enemies: Clone (Episode III), Battle Droid, Battle Droid (Commander), Clone (Episode III, Swamp), Clone (Episode III, Walker)
Starting Characters: Yoda, Chewbacca
True Jedi: 65,000

Part 1 – Kachirho Village

Head to the right and you’ll notice a bridge. To lower it, Force the two panels on the sides of it. Once the bridge is lowered, continue to the right and into the group of clone troopers.

After the cutscene, Order 66 will be issued, and the clones are now after you. Once the clones are taken care of, Force the piles of LEGO pieces on the left into the panels. Force the panels to lower the bridge, then continue down the path.

As you head down the path, you’ll be shown three Wookiees that have been captured by clones. We’ll need to free them all. Start by heading towards the big tree. Use the grapple point to reach the platform, then hop across to the platform on the left. Grapple up the grapple points to reach the first Wookiee. Defeat the clone troopers to free him, then drop down and head to the left.

Head down the bridge to the right and you’ll see a Wookiee up ahead on the path. Before you rescue him however, continue to the right. Destroy the tan boxes, then Force the node to create a grapple point. Grapple up onto the ledge and defeat the clones to rescue the second Wookiee.

Drop down and head back to the left, then head down the path and rescue the final Wookiee. Once all three Wookiees are rescued, head to the left and step on one of the buttons. Your partner will step on the other one, lowering the bridge. Continue down the path.

Part 2 – Kachirho Beach

This is a nice big area. You can fight the enemies here if you want, but your real objective is on the far left side of the beach. There are some LEGO pieces in the sand. Force them into a bridge, then Force one of the small plants on the left to reveal a grapple point. Grapple up onto the ledge, then stand on the bridge and shoot the two targets. This will lower the gate, allowing you to continue.

Part 3 – Swamp

This area has two Battle Droid Commanders calling in lots and lots of droids. You can hop up the ledges and take out the Commanders if you want, but all you really have to do is head down the path and through the opening in the rocks at the end.

Part 4 – Forest Path

Head to the right and continue down the path. At the end of the path, you’ll find a clone in an AT-RT. You can’t use a mind trick to force him out, so you’ll have to attack the walker to kick out the clone. Once the walker is taken care of, Force the plants on the left side near the rock wall to reveal some hidden platforms.

Hop up the platforms and onto the rock ledge, then head to the left. Watch out for the boulders rolling down the slope. You can Force or shoot the boulders to destroy them, or just carefully walk around them. Hop up the platforms at the end of the ledge, then head back to the right.

At the top of the slope you’ll find some LEGO pieces. Force them into platforms, then hop up them and step on one of the buttons. Your partner will step on the other, opening the gate. Continue down the path, where you’ll find another AT-RT.

Take it out, then head to the left, where you’ll find Yoda’s escape pod. Force the four nodes around the hole, then destroy each of them to reveal the escape pod. Force the escape pod to complete the level.

Unlocked Characters: Wookiee (16,000), Clone (Episode III) (10,000), Clone (Episode III, Pilot) (11,000), Clone (Episode III, Swamp) (12,000), Clone (Episode III, Walker) (12,000)

You will also unlock Yoda and Chewbacca if you haven’t already
Defense of Kashyyyk - Free Play Mode
Required Abilities: Double Jump, Force, Grapple, High Jump, Hover, Sith Force, Thermal Detonator

Part 1 - Kachirho Village

Red Power Brick (Super thermal detonator)
As you head through the village towards the gathering of clone troopers, you'll notice a path to the right.







Head to the right and you'll find this weird structure. Sith Force the outside of it to expose the silver object inside.







Destroy the silver object to reveal this Power Brick.









Canister 1
After rescuing the first Wookiee in the tree, look to the left and you'll see a platform with a blue stud on it.







Hover over to it and you'll see another platform on the left.








Hover over to it, then use the grapple point on the left to reach another platform. You'll see this Canister up on a platform on the left. High jump up to it. That grapple point will just take you back to the previous platform, not up to the Canister.





Canister 2
Instead of heading to the right to rescue the second Wookiee, head to the left. You'll find this Canister on a platform above you. Use the grapple point to reach the platform with this Canister.






Part 2 - Kachirho Beach

Canister 3
This Canister can be found on top of a rock on the far right side of the beach. High jump up to reach this.







Canister 4
There are 3 carrots for you to reveal. Force plants to reveal them. The first can be found on the far right side of the area.







The second carrot can be found towards the center of the area.








The third carrot can be found on the far left side of the beach.








Force all 3 carrots to reveal this Canister on a platform above you. After grappling up to the bridge, head to the right to reach this.







Canister 5
There is a platform in the air towards the center of the beach.








High jump onto it, then onto the next platform on the right.








You'll see this Canister on a platform to the right. Hover over to it to reach it.








Part 3 - Swamp

Canister 6
Hop up onto the ledge with the Battle Droid Commander on the right to find this Canister.








Canister 7
On the right side of the swamp, you'll find a sunken ARC-170.








Force it out of the swamp, then quickly hop on top of it and high jump up to this Canister. If you're too slow, the ARC-170 will sink back into the swamp, and you'll have to re-Force it.






Part 4 - Forest Path

Canister 8
As you approach the rock ledge with the boulders, you'll see a black plant on the left side of the path. Sith Force it to reveal a grapple point, then use it to grapple up onto a platform above you.






You'll see this Canister on a platform to the right. Hover over to it.








Canister 9
While walking up the rock ledge, you'll notice a grapple point. Use it to reach the ledge with this Canister.







Canister 10
After revealing the escape pod, don't Force it. Instead, hop on top of it and high jump to this Canister.







Minikit Model: Wookiee Cat
Defense of Kashyyyk - Challenge Mode
Required Abilities: Double Jump, Grapple, High Jump, Hover

Part 1 - Kachirho Village

Blue Canister 1
As you head down the path towards the group of clone troopers, you'll notice a path leading to the right.







Head down it and you'll find this Blue Canister to the right of the structure.








Blue Canister 2
This Blue Canister is next to the hologram projector where the clones receive Order 66.








Blue Canister 3
After rescuing the Wookiee in the tree, look to the left and you'll see this Blue Canister on a platform. Hover over to it.







Blue Canister 4
Instead of heading to the right to rescue the second Wookiee, head to the left and you'll find this Blue Canister on a ledge. Use the grapple point to reach it.






Part 2 - Kachirho Beach

Blue Canister 5
This Blue Canister be found next to the flaming wreckage of a Wookiee Ornithopter.








Blue Canister 6
This Blue Canister is on the far left side of the beach by the rocks.








Part 3 - Swamp

Blue Canister 7
This Blue Canister is on the ledge on the left with the Battle Droid Commander.








Part 4 - Forest Path

Blue Canister 8
When you enter the area, the path will head towards the left. Head to the right instead and you'll find this Blue Canister at the end of the path.







Blue Canister 9
This Blue Canister can be found on top of some rocks on the left side of the rock ledge. High jump up the platforms to reach it.







Blue Canister 10
This Blue Canister can be found hidden by a rock behind the second AT-RT.
Ruin of the Jedi - Story Mode
Palpatine has issued Order 66, turning the Clone Army against the Jedi. Across the galaxy, clones have gunned down their Jedi generals.

Yoda and Obi-Wan Kenobi have survived, and head for the Jedi Temple on Coruscant. They hope to find some answers to this shocking turn of events within the Jedi Archives....

Enemies: Disguised Clone, Clone (Episode III)
Starting Characters: Obi-Wan Kenobi (Episode III), Yoda
True Jedi: 35,000

Part 1 – Temple Exterior

Head to the right and you’ll see the entrance to the temple. Head up the stairs and Force the doors to move them out of the way, allowing you to head inside.

Part 2 – Temple Ruins

Head down the path and you’ll see a red pillar on the left. Force it to create steps, then hop up them to reach the upper ledge. Continue to the right and drop down to the ledge below you. Continue to the right and you’ll find the entrance to the archives. Force the two red pillars to reveal gears. Force one and your partner will Force the other, opening the door. Head inside.

Part 3 – The Jedi Archives

Head down the path, defeating the waves of clones that appear. When you enter the clearing at the end, you’ll notice the door to the records room blocked by a weird crane of sorts. To move it, head into each of the alcoves on the right.

Force the platforms to extend them, then hop up and Force each of the levers (in the center alcove, you’ll have to step on the button on the platform above the lever to lower the force field). This will send power to the center of the room. Once all three levers have been Forced, the crane arm will move, allowing you to enter the records room.

Part 4 – Records Room

Simply head to the right and Force the camera reel to complete the level.

Unlocked Characters: Mace Windu (Episode III) (38,000), Disguised Clone (12,000)
Ruin of the Jedi - Free Play Mode
